trans-unit.source: Provides data for a PropertiesChanged event, which you must create.
Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
A collection of strings, each of which identifies a changed property.
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs"></xref> object.
Call <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs.Dispose> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs>.
The <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs.Dispose> method leaves the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> in an unusable state.

After calling <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs.Dispose>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> was occupying.

For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

Always call <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs.Dispose> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the `Finalize` method of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> object.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the unnamed Boolean parameter set to `true`.
<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with the parameter set to `false`.
When the Boolean parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemObjectPropertiesChangedEventArgs> references.
This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
Gets a collection of the names of the changed properties.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> of property names.
